question: NITI Aayog has established a Frontier Technologies Cloud Innovation Center with which technology major?
explanation:
Indiaâ€™s think tank NITI Aayog (National Institution for Transforming India) has stablished a Frontier Technologies Cloud Innovation Center (CIC) with Amazon Web Services (AWS). This aims to address societal challenges through digital innovation.
This is the first Cloud Innovation Center of Amazon in India and twelfth around the world.
